page.title: 18SCHOOL DAY,Yeoford.
page.content: In the morning after breakfast I put my packed lunch and homework in my bag ready for school. At 8.20 a.m. I walk down the drive ready for the school bus. The school bus usually comes between 8.25 a.m. and 8.30 a.m. When we arrive at school I go to the cloakroom and hang up my bag, I take out my homework and put it in my locker. Next I take out the football to the playground and play with it. The bell rings at 9 a.m. When the bell rings I take the football in, put it away and sit in my seat ready for register. After register we usually do English until break at 10.30 a.m. At break we play games until 10.45 a.m. We come in and do Maths until 11.55 a.m. when we lay up for dinner. We have dinner at 12.00. At 12.30 we go out to play until 1.15, when we come in to do English until 3.30.We go home
